data.name: toggle_toolbar_shortcut
data.value: Press Ctrl-T anywhere in the game to toggle the toolbar!

data.name: game_settings_shortcut
data.value: Press Ctrl-O anywhere in the game to access settings!

data.name: dynamic_settings
data.value: All settings are dynamic and take effect in real-time. Try changing the skin while watching autoplay!

data.name: new_features_are_coming_online
data.value: New features are coming online every update. Make sure to stay up-to-date!

data.name: ui_scaling_settings
data.value: If you find the UI too large or small, try adjusting UI scale in settings!

data.name: screen_scaling_settings
data.value: Try adjusting the "Screen Scaling" mode to change your gameplay or UI area, even in fullscreen!

data.name: free_osu_direct
data.value: What used to be "osu!direct" is available to all users just like on the website. You can access it anywhere using Ctrl-B!

data.name: replay_seeking
data.value: Seeking in replays is available by dragging on the progress bar at the bottom of the screen or by using the left and right arrow keys!

data.name: try_new_mods
data.value: Try scrolling right in mod select to find a bunch of new fun mods!

data.name: embedded_web_content
data.value: Most of the web content (profiles, rankings, etc.) are available natively in-game from the icons on the toolbar!

data.name: beatmap_right_click
data.value: Get more details, hide or delete a beatmap by right-clicking on its panel at song select!

data.name: discover_playlists
data.value: Check out the "playlists" system, which lets users create their own custom and permanent leaderboards!

data.name: toggle_advanced_fps_counter
data.value: Toggle advanced frame / thread statistics with Ctrl-F11!

data.name: replay_pausing
data.value: You can pause during a replay by pressing Space!

data.name: configurable_hotkeys
data.value: Most of the hotkeys in the game are configurable and can be changed to anything you want. Check the bindings panel under input settings!

data.name: skin_editor
data.value: Your gameplay HUD can be customised by using the skin layout editor. Open it at any time via Ctrl-Shift-S!

data.name: mod_presets
data.value: You can create mod presets to make toggling your favourite mod combinations easier!

data.name: mod_customisation_settings
data.value: Many mods have customisation settings that drastically change how they function. Click the Customise button in mod select to view settings!

data.name: random_skin_shortcut
data.value: Press Ctrl-Shift-R to switch to a random skin!

data.name: toggle_replay_settings_shortcut
data.value: While watching a replay, press Ctrl-H to toggle replay settings!

data.name: copy_mods_from_score
data.value: You can easily copy the mods from scores on a leaderboard by right-clicking on them!

data.name: autoplay_beatmap_shortcut
data.value: Ctrl-Enter at song select will start a beatmap in autoplay mode!

data.name: lazer_is_not_a_word
data.value: "Lazer" is not an English word. The correct spelling for the bright light is "laser".

data.name: multithreading_support
data.value: Multithreading support means that even with low "FPS" your input and judgements will be accurate!

data.name: temporary_delete_operations
data.value: All delete operations are temporary until exiting. Restore accidentally deleted content from the maintenance settings!

data.name: global_statistics_shortcut
data.value: Take a look under the hood at performance counters and enable verbose performance logging with Ctrl-F2!

data.name: peek_hud_when_hidden
data.value: When your gameplay HUD is hidden, you can press and hold Ctrl to view it temporarily!

data.name: drag_and_drop_image_in_skin_editor
data.value: Drag and drop any image into the skin editor to load it in quickly!

data.name: menu_tip_title
data.value: a tip for you:
